movie.title: Kiss Me at the Stroke of Midnight
movie.title_english: Kiss Me at the Stroke of Midnight
movie.title_long: Kiss Me at the Stroke of Midnight (2019)
movie.description_intro: Hinana is doing well at school. She is not just a good student, however, because underneath she too longs for romance and the touch of a man. It is about this time that celebrity Kaede visits the school for a shoot. Hinana noticed that Kaede is checking out the school girls and is smitten herself. The good news is that the affection seems to be returned. Then there is a romantic complication.
movie.description_full: Hinana is doing well at school. She is not just a good student, however, because underneath she too longs for romance and the touch of a man. It is about this time that celebrity Kaede visits the school for a shoot. Hinana noticed that Kaede is checking out the school girls and is smitten herself. The good news is that the affection seems to be returned. Then there is a romantic complication.

movies.title: If I Had a Million
movies.summary: Tycoon John Glidden, dying though still vigorous, is so dissatisfied with his relatives and associates that, rather than will his money to any of them, he decides to give it away in million-dollar amounts to strangers picked from the city directory. He picks a meek china salesman; a prostitute; a forger; two ex-vaudevilleans who hate road hogs; a condemned man; a mild-mannered clerk; a boisterous marine; and an oppressed inmate of an old ladies' home.

movies.title: Elsewhere
movies.summary: Still mourning the death of his wife, Bruno is hopelessly attached to the seaside cottage they built together. When he's evicted by his soulless in-laws, Bruno vows to get it back at any price.
movies.description_full: Still mourning the death of his wife, Bruno is hopelessly attached to the seaside cottage they built together. When he's evicted by his soulless in-laws, Bruno vows to get it back at any price.
movies.synopsis: Still mourning the death of his wife, Bruno is hopelessly attached to the seaside cottage they built together. When he's evicted by his soulless in-laws, Bruno vows to get it back at any price.

movies.title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
movies.title_english: The Odd Life of Timothy Green
movies.title_long: The Odd Life of Timothy Green (2012)
movies.summary: After receiving bad news from a fertility doctor, Cindy and Jim Green try to bury their dreams of having a child by writing out all the great traits their child would have and putting them in a box in the garden. During a freak storm in the middle of the night, they awake to find a boy named Timothy, with leaves growing from his ankles, standing in their kitchen calling them mom and dad. Cindy and Jim are thrown into the midst of parenthood and over the coming months, Timothy will teach them more than they could have imagined about being parents and raising a child, no matter how he comes into their lives.

movies.title: Gina, an Actress, Age 29
movies.summary: A struggling young actress lands her first job...only to discover that her "part" is to lie to an assembly of factory workers to keep them from unionizing.
movies.description_full: A struggling young actress lands her first job...only to discover that her "part" is to lie to an assembly of factory workers to keep them from unionizing.
